title: Is there an alternate link to download the apk?
body: I uninstalled Google Play services since it was draining my battery, which means I won't be able to download the app off the Play store. Is there another way I can get the apk for the app?

replies.body: You could reinstall it, download the chat client then uninstall it again, I guess...
I tried that, but google play services kept crashing every few seconds, and google play store wouldn't load.
